title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of the Java editor, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler does not appear when right-clicking.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Expected: This should popup a menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc. 

Actual: The menu does not appear.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

The popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the ruler, but it does not.
